rows.label: tev900492_MSG0010
rows.name: My friend... What is this small creature?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0020
rows.name:
A "housecat"...? I see.
So that is its name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0030
rows.name:
Hmm... Something about its features
brings to mind a proud Wrothian warrior...
Perhaps I am imagining it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0040
rows.name:
Pray tell, what relation do these
"housecat" creatures bear to the
people of Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_JNK0050
rows.name: Disclose

rows.label: tev900492_SEL0060
rows.name: Admit that cats are human pets.

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0070
rows.name:
Indeed, to bring them with you to Mira,
knowing all the dangers it poses, speaks
to an undeniable level of infatuation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0080
rows.name:
But it does not strain the imagination.
Your cats have a simple innocence which
I recognize from Wroth's own babes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0090
rows.name:
It must be difficult to survive and thrive on
Mira with bodies so diminutive as theirs...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0100
rows.name:
But if they live under humans' protection,
perhaps they may not be denied a life of
warmth, peace and comfort...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0110
rows.name:
The next time you see a housecat, you
must spare no effort to give it plentiful
nuzzles. I demand it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_JNK0120
rows.name: Celebrate

rows.label: tev900492_SEL0130
rows.name: Answer that cats are hunters of vermin.

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0140
rows.name:
Oho... Hunters, are they?
I would like to hear more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0150
rows.name:
...I see. So they hunt small vermin which
are difficult for humans to trap, and by
doing so contribute to human prosperity?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0160
rows.name: Hah. I did have the feeling it might be so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0170
rows.name:
Its body is lithe, its eyesight sharp, and its
claws perfectly angled to hold prey. All the
hallmarks of a proud and fearsome hunter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0180
rows.name:
I, too, in my youngest days, honed my
martial spirit by hunting for sustenance.
I feel a kinship with the creature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0190
rows.name:
"Housecat"... Truly, you and I are no
strangers, little sister. I grow more
fascinated with each minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_JNK0200
rows.name: Confabulate

rows.label: tev900492_SEL0210
rows.name:
Lie that cats are mystical creatures who turn
into monsters once they reach a certain age.

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0220
rows.name:
My friend... Do you speak the truth?
Or do you take me for a fool, fit to be
trifled with?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0230
rows.name:
...You say that such stories
have been passed down since
the olden days on Earth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0240
rows.name:
That they grew to giant size, with
teeth to match? That they walked on
hind legs, and devoured humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0250
rows.name:
I find it difficult to credit... Would their
sweet exterior be then but a deception, in
order to hide their true capabilities...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0260
rows.name:
If so, then my deepest fear would be
reserved for the humans who decided to
invite and keep them inside their cities...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900492_MSG0270
rows.name:
Hmm... I continue to underestimate your
race. I will have to revise my assessment
of you. This was a welcome lesson.[ST:wait ]
